allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement licence key system with Stripe and Supabase

API Changes:
- Add Supabase and Stripe dependencies
- Create licence validation endpoint \(POST /licence/validate\)
- Create Stripe webhook handler for payment events
- Create checkout session endpoint for Stripe Checkout
- Add licence key generator utility

Extension Changes:
- Add licence service for validation and storage
- Add licence message handlers in background script
- Add Licence tab to popup with upgrade/activation UI
- Implement startup licence check with daily revalidation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
